Game.tutorial_00_landscape:
Collect clusters of 3 or more adjacent gems 
or rings with the center gem of the same color 
on the grid. New gems fall in from above. Collect gold 
rings and silver rings to trigger a bonus game.
Game.tutorial_02_landscape:
Collect 4 silver rings to trigger the Shuffle Bonus.
Gems may change position on the grid, where they
may be randomly collected or form new clusters.
Game.tutorial_00_portrait:
Collect clusters of 3 or more
adjacent gems or rings 
with the center gem of the same
color on the grid.
New gems fall in from above.
Collect gold rings
and silver rings to
trigger a bonus game.
Game.tutorial_01_portrait:
Collect 4 gold rings to
trigger the Gem Rush Bonus.
Collect additional gems or
reveal a {@IW_tutorial@} to
win a prize instantly.
Game.tutorial_02_portrait:
Collect 4 silver rings to
trigger the Shuffle Bonus.
Gems may change
position on the grid,
where they may be randomly
collected or form new clusters.
